description.value:
You've proven to be able to keep an eye out for danger. At the start of each of your turns, you gain an additional reaction that you can only use for your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.feats.Item.2ORcBQibJPXCHyiJ]{Third Eye} reaction.

Additionally, you can re-enter @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.ymyhuyGwv8vEnLIH]{Iai Stance} after a successful strike as part of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.feats.Item.ngb2ZcuFWuouDG2l]{Shining into the Void} action. And the target only becomes immune to Shining into the Void after it has been used twice on them within the same hour.
